Click Here to Register Now

Learn How To Beat The Bank - Prepare to be amazed by our special guest, Attorney Bob Diamond. At this month's meeting, you will learn how to make money in real estate today even if you are just starting out and don't have a lot of cash for down payment and you don't want to borrow from banks.

Bob has been investing in real estate for over twenty years and has participated as the buyer, seller, or attorney in over one hundred million dollars in real estate transactions over the past twenty years.

Here is an incredible opportunity for you to...

- Learn how to acquire an unlimited number of properties with 100% built in bank financing, no credit check and never having to qualify for a loan.
- Make money in real estate while REALLY helping people... without needing credit, and without any funds of your own...
- Take advantage of the Opportunity that's now become available to you because of our current financial crisis...
- Finally decide to take action and get started...

We asked Bob to come to our August Monthly Meeting because Bob has identified a totally unique and groundbreaking opportunity for investors to acquire properties without making a down payment, using their own credit or getting a loan from a lender. He has also invented a unique way of acquiring properties using loan modifications that will amaze you as you learn how you can acquire multiple "cash eating alligator" properties from "don't wanter" investors that you can turn into golden cash cows using Bob's unique system!

This is going to put you as one of Bob's investors in the unique position of being able to profit from millions of dollars in real estate even if you don't have a lot of capital or the credit to borrow from the banks.
